llms.txt
# Kaia Docs
## Learn
[Why Kaia](https://docs.kaia.io/learn/why-kaia): Learn about why you should choose Kaia Chain
[Accounts](https://docs.kaia.io/learn/accounts): Explains account structures, key management, and security features in the Kaia chain.
[Transactions](https://docs.kaia.io/learn/transactions): Guide for understanding transaction on Kaia Chain
[Transaction Fees](https://docs.kaia.io/learn/transaction-fees): Explain transaction fees on Kaia Chain
[Smart Contracts](https://docs.kaia.io/learn/smart-contracts): Guide for understanding smart contracts and Kaia Virtual Machine
[Precompiled Contracts](https://docs.kaia.io/learn/smart-contracts/precompiled-contracts): Explains Precompile contracts on Kaia Chain
[Kaia Consensus Mechanism](https://docs.kaia.io/learn/consensus-mechanism): Explains Kaia's consensus mechanism for efficient and secure blockchain transactions.
[Kaia Network Identifier](https://docs.kaia.io/learn/kni): Guide for Kaia Network Identifier.
[Kaia Native Coin](https://docs.kaia.io/learn/token-economics/kaia-native-token): Provides information about Kaia Coin
[Token Economy](https://docs.kaia.io/learn/token-economics/token-economy):Explains Kaia's token economy and funding structures for its blockchain ecosystem and growth initiatives.
[Governance](https://docs.kaia.io/learn/governance/governance-by-kip): Provide information about various implementation for governance system.
## Build
[Getting Started](https://docs.kaia.io/build/get-started/before-you-start): Provide information about what is needed to get started building on Kaia
[Deploy smart contract using Hardhat](https://docs.kaia.io/build/get-started/hardhat): Guide for deploying Soulbound Tokens on Kaia using Hardhat.
[Get Kaia](https://docs.kaia.io/build/get-started/getting-kaia): Guide for obtaining KAIA via Faucets and Exchanges
[Fee Delegation](https://docs.kaia.io/build/transactions/fee-delegation): Provide information about fee delegation
[Partial Fee Delegation](https://docs.kaia.io/build/transactions/partial-fee-delegation): Provide information about partial fee delegation
[IDE and Tools](https://docs.kaia.io/build/smart-contracts/ide-and-tools): Guide for list of development tools that is available to help smart contract development on Kaia.
[Deploy smart contract using Foundry](https://docs.kaia.io/build/smart-contracts/deploy/foundry): Guide for deploying smart contract on Kaia using Foundry.
[Deploy smart contract using Thirdweb](https://docs.kaia.io/build/smart-contracts/deploy/thirdweb): Guide for deploying smart contract on Kaia using Thirdweb.
[Deploy smart contract using Private Network](https://docs.kaia.io/build/smart-contracts/deploy/private-network): Guide for deploying smart contract on Kaia using Private network.
[Verify smart contract using Block Explorers](https://docs.kaia.io/build/smart-contracts/verify/block-explorers): Guide for verifying smart contract on Kaia using Block Explorer.
[Verify smart contract using Hardhat](https://docs.kaia.io/build/smart-contracts/verify/hardhat): Guide for verifying smart contract on Kaia using Hardhat.
[Verify smart contract using Sourcify](https://docs.kaia.io/build/smart-contracts/verify/sourcify): Guide for verifying smart contract on Kaia using Sourcify.
[Kaia Compatible Tokens](https://docs.kaia.io/build/smart-contracts/token-standard): Provide information for Kaia Compatible Tokens
[Build Fee Delegation Example](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tutorials/fee-delegation-example): Guide for building fee delegation example
[Build a dApp using Scaffold-ETH 2](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tutorials/scaffold-eth): Guide for building a dApp using Scaffold-ETH 2
[Build a Buy-Me-A-Coffee DApp](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tutorials/buy-me-a-coffee) : Guide for building a Buy-Me-A-COffee DApp
[Connecting MetaMask to Kaia](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tutorials/connecting-metamask): Guide for connecting MetMask to Kaia
[Connect Remix to Kaia](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tutorials/connecting-remix): Guide for connecting Remix IDE with Kaia for deploying smart contracts.
[Kaia Eliza Plugin](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tutorials/eliza-plugin-guide): Guide for building ai agents on Kaia using ElizaOS
[Migrate Ethereum App to Kaia](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tutorials/migrating-ethereum-app-to-kaia): Guide for migrating Ethereum dapp to Kaia chain
[Kaia Online Toolkit](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tools/kaia-online-toolkit): provides code examples to help you to utilize the Kaia SDK(caver-js) easily and demo page for developers to use simple online tools.
[Wallets](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tools/wallets): Provides information about supported wallets on Kaia
[Oracles](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tools/oracles): Provides information and guide about decentralized oracle providers on Kaia
[Indexers](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tools/indexers): Provides information and guide about indexers on Kaia
[Crosschain](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tools/cross-chain): Provides information and guide about cross chain protocols supported by Kaia
[Block Explorer](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tools/block-explorers): Guide on the various block explorers on Kaia.
[Token Management](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tools/token-management): Guide on token management services on Kaia
[Kaia Contract Wizard](https://docs.kaia.io/build/tools/kaia-contracts-wizard): Guide on using Kaia Contract Wizard
## Node
[About Kaia Nodes](https://docs.kaia.io/nodes): Explains the types of nodes on Kaia Chain
[Endpoint Node](https://docs.kaia.io/nodes/endpoint-node): Provide information and guide on setting up Endpoint node
[Core Cell Overview](https://docs.kaia.io/nodes/core-cell): Explains the structure and components of Core Cells in the Kaia blockchain network.
[Service Chain](https://docs.kaia.io/nodes/service-chain): Provide information and guide on Service chain on Kaia
[Node Package Download](https://docs.kaia.io/nodes/downloads): Guide on how to download the latest stable release of Kaia
## References
[Public JSON RPC References](https://docs.kaia.io/references/public-en): Provide access to public JSON-RPC endpoints for interacting with the Kaia network
[RPC API Reference](https://docs.kaia.io/references/json-rpc/references): Provides information on all the RPC API Reference on Kaia
[Kaia SDK References](https://docs.kaia.io/references/sdk): Provide API references and tutorials for interacting with kaia nodes and the kaia Network.
[Ethers.js Extension Guide](https://docs.kaia.io/references/sdk/ethers-ext/getting-started): Guide for integrating Ethers.js Extension with Kaia SDK
[Web3.js Extension Guide](https://docs.kaia.io/references/sdk/web3js-ext/getting-started): Guide for integrating Web3.js Extension with Kaia SDK
[Web3.j Extension Guide](https://docs.kaia.io/references/sdk/web3j-ext/getting-started): Guide for integrating Web3.j Extension with Kaia SDK
[Web3.py Extension Guide](https://docs.kaia.io/references/sdk/web3j-ext/getting-started): Guide for integrating Web3.py Extension with Kaia SDK
[Message Signing Standards](https://docs.kaia.io/references/signed-message/): Explains message signing standards and practices for cryptographic actions in blockchain applications.
[Transaction Error Codes](https://docs.kaia.io/references/transaction-error-codes): To provide developers with a reference for transaction error codes and their meanings in the Kaia platform.
[Kaia Contract Addresses](https://docs.kaia.io/references/contract-addresses): Lists deployed addresses of notable system contracts for the Kaia blockchain.
## Mini dApps
[Line Mini DApp with Unity](https://docs.kaia.io/minidapps): Guide for building mini dApps on LINE with Web3 integration using Unity WebGL and Kaia's infrastructure.
[LINE Mini DApp with Cocos Creator](https://docs.kaia.io/minidapps/cocos-creator): Guide for building mini dApps on LINE with Web3 integration using Cocos Creator Web Build and Kaia's infrastructure.
[Survey Mini DApp](https://docs.kaia.io/minidapps/survey-minidapp/intro): Guide for building an example survey mini dApp
## Others
[Kaia Node Setup Guide](https://docs.kaia.io/misc/operation/chaindata-snapshot): Instructions for using a chaindata snapshot to start a Kaia node efficiently.
[Node Quick Reference](https://docs.kaia.io/misc/operation):  Guide serves as a handy quick reference for Node operators to efficiently configure, monitor, and troubleshoot their Kaia nodes.
[Kaia FAQ](https://docs.kaia.io/misc/faq): Provide FAQ information about Kaia blockchain and its development resources.
[Glossary](https://docs.kaia.io/misc/glossary): Provides explanation on technical terms specific to the Kaia Blockchain
[Open Source Kaia Development](https://docs.kaia.io/misc/opensource): Encouraging community involvement in the Kaia blockchain through open-source development and funding support.
[Kaia Docs Localization Contribution](https://docs.kaia.io/misc/internationalization): Encourages contributions for translating and improving the localization of Kaia Docs
[Kaia Transition](https://docs.kaia.io/misc/kaia-transition/): To inform users about the transition from Finschia and Klaytn blockchains to the Kaia blockchain and token swapping.
[Kaia Brand Guidelines](https://docs.kaia.io/misc/brand): To provide branding guidelines for consistent logo and color usage for the Kaia project.
